title: FFrankie
author: FFrankie
created_time: December 06, 2022, 09:12:40 PMLast edit: December 07, 2022, 06:05:56 PM by FFrankie
content: Looking for someone that is good at statistics/math in order to prove something.We have a new policy at my work that will actually cost my company more money in the long run, and I am not good enough at math to prove it to my boss. So I am looking to hire someone that is good enough at math that can prove it with numbers that the new policy actually costs us money. I could be wrong, but I don't think I am based upon my rough math but my rough math isn't good enough to prove it to my boss I need exact numbersIts hard to explain over text, so I am looking to hire someone that understands verbal english well enough for me to explain the problem to them over voice, Its a permutation and combination problem I believe.Please PM me with a way to contact you with a way I can contact you via voice and I will explain the problem in more detail and you can let me know how much BTC you want  Edit. I think you need to be fluentish because of the complexity of the problem

comments.author: Techdev
comments.body: Hello there. Thanks for sharing this. I have a background in Economic statistics, and G.I.S. I am good in Mathematics and statistics. My English is also fluent, both written and spoken. Hit me on Telegram: @ElevatedWarrior

comments.author: Commguard
comments.body: Hey, I'm from Kenya, our official language is English, with a Bsc in Statistics. Let's talk; @Web3Futurist on TG

comments.author: FFrankie
comments.body: still looking for someone I believe the first user that posted on this was more a scammer than notthe guy from Kenya was legit but he could not solve my problem

comments.author: Broadanbig
comments.created_time: December 07, 2022, 07:46:46 PMLast edit: December 08, 2022, 08:30:20 AM by Broadanbig
comments.body: Quote from: FFrankie on December 07, 2022, 04:02:51 PMstill looking for someone I believe the first user that posted on this was more a scammer than notthe guy from Kenya was legit but he could not solve my problem I sent a pm still waiting for your response. You can send me a message on telegram with an audio explaining  what you want me to do.Edit.......I had to remove my telegram handle here as scammers have started sending me series of scam messages. Check dm for my telegram handle and do well to drop yours so I could know and attend to you with immediate response.
